column1: Uchi////Her first winning suggestion of the night was the Suishin sake
column2: which was absolutely "fresh and light" as the menu said. Note to those who are not regular sake drinkers: They serve it in a small glass which is placed in a square wooden containers. The sake overflows the glass and there is some in the wooden container (thanks to the bartender's "generous pour")
column3: so be careful with the glass otherwise you will have sake drips all over your clothes like I did. And make sure to drink everything from the wooden container at the end!
